quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: A river cuts through rock not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
Little by little, one travels far.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can’t go on but you keep going anyway.
Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Starve your distractions, feed your focus.
Concentration is the secret of strength.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Clarity comes from action, not thought.
Rule your mind or it will rule you.
author: Horace

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Don’t trade what you want most for what you want now.
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Success demands singleness of purpose.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Mistakes are proof that you are trying.
The more that you read, the more things you will know.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
author: Brian Herbert

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: Peter T. McIntyre

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
